body.p: The decisions of the Chair and the Vice-Chair(s) to publish the documents specified in section 56 shall be subject to oversight by the Trustees’ Due Process Oversight Committee. After publication, the ISSB shall review the comments made on each document and make further decisions on the related projects in accordance with the ISSB’s usual procedures as outlined in sections 53–55 and 58.
